excerpt: "Masks are commonplace due to COVID-19 so companies are expanding their facial recognition capacity to recognize the masked faces. Privacy concerns are more pressing than ever as the pandemic could increase society surveillance. (TNS) — Facial recognition surveillance systems are ominous.
